TimelineEvents.Notes: Awoke anxious, neck stiff; used warm pad + patch, dozed on/off.
Up for day; total ≈6 h fragmented.
Up for day
Fog 2 → 1 after water; right-temple tightness 2 / 10, right posterior-neck 2, left-scap dull 1. Underlying money/job anxiety.
08 oz plain water
Bottle #1, 1/4 pkt electrolytes; 16 oz down by 07:10, finished by 08:00
Oatmeal + blueberries + 1 steamed egg.

Morning care: Chin-tucks ×10 • Ear-to-shoulder stretch 10 breaths/side • “Armpit-smell” stretch 10 breaths/side • Lacrosse-ball press-release on right scap (07 : 00) • Warm 3 min + cool cloth 45 s on right occiput.
Riboflavin with breakfast
Magnesium glycinate with breakfast
Pour-over coffee (~120 mg) finished 07 : 10.
Horror movie 28 weeks later
Mid-day: Lunch 12 : 30 – 13 : 00 (rice + vegetables; light-seasoned to skip soy sauce). Finished Bottle #2 32 oz (plain) by 13 : 00 → cumulative fluids ≈ 64 oz.
Emotional tears (positive) → right-temple tension briefly up to 2.5/10; cool cloth + slow breathing → back to 2/10 within 15 min.
Afternoon: Light work block; hourly micro-moves; no nap; pain held ≤ 2. Snacked on two string-cheese sticks 15 : 30.
Homemade spicy-sour soup (contained soy-sauce base).
Evening care: Contrast set on right neck/scap 19 : 45 (warm 5 min → cool 1 min) • Small pillow under elbow while reading to keep scapula level.
Evening status (21 : 30): Pain: right-temple ≤ 1.5 • neck ≤ 1.5 • left scap calm. Fog 0. Still mild money/job rumination.
In bed after late budgeting; took Unisom 12.5 mg. Brief 10-min 'sensory fast-forward' anxiety episode.
Bedtime dose
Took Unisom 12.5 mg again; lights out ≈22 : 00.
Bedtime dose
Fell asleep after anxiety episode.

StressNotes: Mentor meeting, mild money/job rumination. Anxiety spike around midnight.

PainEpisodes.Notes: Pain up to 2.5/10 after emotional meeting; resolved to ≤1.5 by bedtime.

Notes: Skipped evening Mg and fish-oil. Movie: 28 Weeks Later. Anxiety episode at bedtime, fragmented sleep.
